name: sas.vim
install_details:
Unix or Linux: copy the script into $HOME/.vim/indent or in $VIM/vimfiles
Windows: copy the script into $VIM_INSTALL_DIR\vimfiles\indent

versions.release_notes:
1. Fixed a bug for if statement
2. More flexibility for statements with do
3. Add fault tolerance for missing "run;" statements at the end of data/proc step
